name: Tennis Cannon
description:
A simple game of Tennis for two people using cannons.

Whoever scores five points wins the game first

Control

Main menu
W / A / S / D - Move cursor
Space - Select option

Green player

W / S - Move (no ball)
W / S - Aim Cannon (Ball)
Space - Shoot (with ball)

Red Player

Up Arrow / Down Arrow - Move (no ball)
Up / Down Arrow - Aim cannon (with ball)
Shift - Shoot (with ball)
